alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 7:08PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Leon County through 745 PM EDT... At 708 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tallahassee, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Macon Community Park, Levy Park, Lake Iamonia, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Maclay State Gardens, Killearn Lakes, Moccasin Gap, Killearn Estates, Lake Ella, Tallahassee Mall, Bradfordville, Winthrop Park, Forest Meadows Park and Pisgah Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
